mapper.select: select l.lecture_title,l.lecture_year, l.teacher_name , s.* from lectures l left outer join subjectscore s on l.lecture_num =s.lecture_num where l.lecture_year = #{year}
select Distinct l.lecture_year from subjectscore s left outer join lectures l on l.lecture_num = s.lecture_num order by 1
select l.lecture_title, l.lecture_year, l.subjectcredit, l.teacher_name , s.* from lectures l left outer join subjectscore s on l.lecture_num =s.lecture_num where l.lecture_num = #{num}
select Distinct l.lecture_title, l.lecture_num, s.id from lectures l left outer join subjectscore s on l.lecture_num =s.lecture_num
select l.lecture_title, l.lecture_year, l.teacher_name, l.subjectcredit , s.* from lectures l left outer join subjectscore s on l.lecture_num =s.lecture_num
